title: Textile, late 19th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved roller on plain weave; mordant painted and dyed and resist dyed (chitnz) on plain weave
dimensions:
Warp x Weft: 63.5 x 31 cm (25 x 12 3/16 in.)
H x W: 160 x 78 cm (5 ft. 3 in. x 30 11/16 in.)
description: Chintz with a brilliant blue ground showing a coarse chinoiserie design in red, yellow, blue, black, brown and green. Two groups of Chinese figures in staggered repeat.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, late 19th century.Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved roller on plain weave; mordant painted and dyed and resist dyed (chitnz) on plain weave. Gift of Harold M. Bailey. 1960-79-37.
